title: (x) Font used on Crusade DVD package / square sans - Beta Sans {Akira}
content:
This font was used for the descriptive text on the back of the packaging for the DVD set of the TV show Crusade (a Babylon 5 spin-off). Note the distinctive characters: g, e, a, r, f, t, m. WhatTheFont's closest match was Netto, but that is wrong. Can anyone identify this font? Thanks, Kirk

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [BattleWon.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110530194254/http:/typophile.com/files/BattleWon_0.jpg) | 40.25 KB |
author: kirk

comments.content: Hi Akira. You get around! Thanks again. The font is indeed Betasans from Shift Fonts. Kirk
